sentences.english: I keep going round and round in circles and I don't see the hotel.

sentences.english: After we left our luggages in the hotel, then went to visit Tian'an men Square directly.
sentences.chinese: 我们把行李放到酒店后，就直接去参观天安门。

sentences.english: Two free internet terminals can be found in the Lindner's business corner.

sentences.english: Abides by the Sofitel Employee Handbook.

sentences.english: Caesar Palace Hotel is a foreign-related business-type hotel.

sentences.english: And for that matter, nearly every hotel I've stayed at has also had issues with Wi-Fi.
sentences.chinese: 并且几乎我住过的所有酒店也都有WiFi热点问题。

sentences.english: What kind of hotel would you like, five-star or something simpler?
sentences.chinese: 您愿意要什么样的酒店，五星级的还是普通些的？

definition: to stay (at a hotel etc during a trip)
to check in (at a hotel etc)
